website_summaries.verdict: Professional grade TENS machine that has multiple settings for personalized use patterns.
pros: Versatile unit delivers 8 different massage modes and 20 strength levels
Align electrodes exactly in line with your needs
Battery lasts up to two hours per session and you can recharge for multiple sessions per day
Recharges with DC or USB connection
Portable product comes with 4 reusable pads and a leather bag for storage
cons: Some problems with the size of the product if you are wearing / using your TENS unit all day long

customer_reviews.title: Immediate relief
customer_reviews.text: I have serious damage to my shoulder muscles from an accident and my physical therapist recommended I get a tens unit for home therapy. I knew the benefits of the tens unit from use after my sessions, so I took his advice. This unit is easy to use and the perfect size! I used it immediately and the benefits are the same as the professional one used by my physical therapist. If you are considering buying one, this is it!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by acupuncturist to treat any muscle problem
customer_reviews.text: The massager is such an awesome tool to help esasing up my sciatica and any other nerve/muscle problem. Recommended by my acupuncturist & I'm so happy to have them & using it even when I'm working since I stand a lot which causing my lower back pain & pinch nerve/sciatica. I could choose to have them working on my muscle for 2 hours. They definitely save me some money for massage therapy.I could have them whenever I need it.
customer_reviews.author: RLee

customer_reviews.title: Using it after knee replacement
customer_reviews.text: I bought the unit, then started getting nervous after reading some of the sellers answers to questions regarding using it after joint replacement (rumors of burns, etc.) I think their answer is more about worrying about liability than fact. I had the post-op appointment with my orthopedic surgeon this week and asked. He said a TENS unit absolutely can be used after joint replacement, and that physical therapy often includes TENS treatments. He suggested placing two of the pads above my knee joint on the quads and two below my knee, a couple of inches apart. I've used it twice now and it absolutely is helping the pain. If in doubt, ask your doctor. I'm so glad I did!
customer_reviews.author: Twig

customer_reviews.title: Tens ... A Ten
customer_reviews.text: Pro Grade Tens .. I have had Great success with this Machine .. I wish that it was backlit . as in the dark cannot adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Judith K. Nevitt

customer_reviews.title: You will LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE my tens unit! It has SUPER POWER and never runs out! The recharger works very quickly, too. I. Have another tens unit that is run by battery and the batteries would run low after the first use; I would always use it on the highest setting. This one, I have never gone higher than a 5, and it goes up to 20! I LOVE it. I usually go to the chiropractor and massage therapy every month and i have completely skipped going this month! I use it on my shoulders nearly every day and i had immediate improvement with muscle pain. Buy it! You wont be sorry!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Tens unit from Easy@Home
customer_reviews.text: loved it!! stopped working after 6 months. First response--3 star My first review was a 3 star. I sent a e-mail to Easy@Home about my problem. They are on top of it. Had a response the next day. They gave me some suggestions to fix my issue. They also said if that didn't work they would send out a new unit and a prepaid returned shipping label. This is a company that you want to do business with!! We have received the new unit, before we sent back the old one. Now that is CUSTOMER SERVICE!!!! Thank You, Easy@Home Doug Foster
customer_reviews.author: Carey Foster

customer_reviews.title: Helps Your Pain
customer_reviews.text: Works very well on my strained muscle on my back. My Physical Therapy doctor was impressed with it. Easy to use. Bought two, one to leave at my vacation home. Told my brother-in-law and Sister about the tens and they bought the product. We are all thankful to have them as they give relief from pain.
customer_reviews.author: ASKeg

customer_reviews.title: First unit came and was DOA. Amazon refunded me ...
customer_reviews.text: First unit came and was DOA. Amazon refunded me immediately and I ordered another one. The item works as described and offers relief for the muscle strains in my shoulder. I just wish the pads lasted longer before needing to be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: JG526

customer_reviews.title: Very Easy to Use!!
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to use and the instructions were very easy to understand. I can’t rate this item, yet, regarding the effectiveness of pain relief. The battery life could be better. I used it for an hour in the morning, using both the A and B plug-ins, and then used it again this evening, again using the A and B plug-ins. My battery life was at 50%. Not sure if that is normal. Right now, I am VERY pleased with this product. I’ll write another review regarding pain effectiveness later.
customer_reviews.author: sfcwwjr

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful
customer_reviews.text: I have a pinched nerve that affects the neck to the left shoulder down thru the left arm. I receive this on a Sunday and have been better and better by friday. It really works the muscles. I can only bring up the intensity to no more then 50% as it can be too much. This is an easy to use device, just slap on the pad's and select say Shoulder and Massage and then slowly bring up the Intensity. I have used just 2 pads but it can support 4. Battery last and lasts. I have used it for over an hour and the battery was no less then halfway used. Charges up quickly.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Powerful tool but stim pads not up to par
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Almost as powerful as the one i use in PT. I took a star off though bc the stim pads wear out super fast and you’ll have to order more way too quickly considering the price. I tried to contact the company about this but they did not respond.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Kaplan

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Great for the money, almost as good as my Dr prescribed one. Just wish the keypad lit up as well as the screen. Definitely definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Kelly JoAnn

customer_reviews.title: Battery charge does not last
customer_reviews.text: Stay away from this device if you want it to last longer than several months. Unfortunately the charge on the battery does not last long when storing. I fully charge the battery before putting it away about 3 weeks ago. Today I attempted to use it and the battery is completely drained. This is unacceptable. I now have to fully charge the unit again in order to use it. We are talkin about 3 weeks, not three months. I own devices that have lasted many, many months after being stored fully charged. Look elsewhere for a reliable device
customer_reviews.author: Eddie R Lopez

customer_reviews.title: A wise investment
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised how well this works. There is a huge difference between this unit and the ones from the drug store. This is the first day I used it so it will take a few days of use to know if it will ease the pain in my Thorasic spine.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I are very pleased with this TENS unit. It is very easy to use and not at all complicated. Using it really helps our back and leg pain. The unit holds a charge for a very long time. Very affordable price and arrived promptly.
customer_reviews.author: Hockeylady

customer_reviews.title: Not the worst but not the best...
customer_reviews.text: If I had to grade this on a scale of F to A I'd give it a B-. It helps with the pain, but the lack of customization in regards to settings is middle of the road. Battery life is actually good. The buttons are loud when you press them. The display is vibrant, but why the settings buttons are not back-lit is questionable. It's a great device.
customer_reviews.author: TheMrBerryhill

customer_reviews.title: pleasantly surprised!!
customer_reviews.text: I thought for sure this thing was going to suck.... I thought it was going to be weak. but to my surprise it was awesome! My boyfriend who has nerve damage loved it!! it made his muscles pulse at only level 2! it is super small and easy to travel with.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Huntley

customer_reviews.title: Truly Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on a recommendation of a friend. I am so glad I did. I use it every night on my night and it enables me to sleep with a minimum of pain. Before I used the TENS unit I couldn't get comfortable in bed at all and I just tossed and turned and woke up every few hours from the pain. It works great for me hopefully it will work for other people as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: I’m used to getting hooked up at the chiropractors office to those giant machines, so I was veeeeery skeptical about buying this because how can a handheld device compare to something like that. The good news is for anyone reading, you won’t be disappointed in the power this puts out. I suggest buying the pads in bulk, they’re extremely cheap to buy, they don’t last very long, but that’s not even anything that should deter you from buying this, it’s absolutely worth it. I think I got 40 pads for ten bucks or something.
customer_reviews.author: Nicci

customer_reviews.title: Don't Need a More Expensive Device!
customer_reviews.text: I love this unit. I bought another as backups and gifts. But so far I haven't needed to use a backup and its been about 8 months since I bought it. I like the preset programs but I do wish I could program my own. But I use this often. I do like the timer because I use it on my way to sleep. Initially when using it, it made me a little sore. But you have to reposition the pads. Its like a massage when your working out a knot. Not effective if you stay in the same spot. I wish I could use it while charging
customer_reviews.author: tanders123

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I've had other home tens units, but none work as well. This has plenty of power and very easy to adjust. I am being treated for shifted vertebra, and this gives me relief.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Norris

customer_reviews.title: works great and i only use once a month since my ...
customer_reviews.text: I pulled the muscle on my lower back, works great and i only use once a month since my injury is minor but it saves me money from Chiropractor visit.
customer_reviews.author: Ky N.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item in December, 2019, but did not need to use it until February 2020. It worked five (5) times, then completely failed to work. Battery power was good, it just would not respond to the buttons. Because I did not use it immediately, it turned out to be too late to return for a refund. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY ON THIS PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.author: W. E. Sorrell

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it
customer_reviews.text: My doctor's assistant suggested I get a TENS unit to use at home in addition to my office treatments. I chose this one because it's described as professional grade. I'm very happy with it! It has been worth the money and has been a huge help in my therapeutic recovery from an accident.
customer_reviews.author: KDE

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: Recently bought the machine, have used it several times. Works amazingly. Pads will need to be replaced probably around 20 or 30 uses. However I have been impressed feels like I am in the Chiropractors office. It is very strong. Zero complaints at this time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money. Unless your money doesn’t matter.
customer_reviews.text: Very limited in programmed options and no custom slots. For the price, this is a waste of money. I now have 2 TENS+EMS (and hundreds of electrode patches. They are devices that are customizable. All for much less than this single unit.
customer_reviews.author: publius

customer_reviews.title: Good til recharge then crap
customer_reviews.text: This product initially worked great! Just what I needed -- massive broken leg and broken back. It was a Godsend -- until it was time to recharge it. Got one run of battery life out of it and after several attempts it only blinks and nothing else. NOT worth all the money -- especially for someone on long term disability.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Treubig

customer_reviews.title: Worked Once - No Longer Powers Up or Takes a Charge
customer_reviews.text: Only worked once!?! A week after I used it, it had no charge. I plugged it in and it started charging. Now, it won't show any charging status and will not even attempt to turn on. What JUNK! I would not recommend this product to anyone as it's clear that the quality is LOW and for this kind of money, not worth it!
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: It works Great and the battery seems to last forever! Love it! You might want to buy extra electrodes because they really don't last that long other than that I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Janice G

customer_reviews.title: Buy a different unit.
customer_reviews.text: This expensive tens unit is not worth the money. It doesn't adjust the intensity level very well. It goes from just a tickle to intensive with just one change of the level. When using both a and b the b side lacked any power. Save your money and don't buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a less expensive one at first and would recommend going to one like this. The battery stays charged well and I find it works great. I do wish all the buttons would stay lit up when making adjustments to the intensity settings. You can’t see it in the dark if you need to adjust unless you have additional lighting on. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Chadwick

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended for pain management
customer_reviews.text: This product is very easy to use. You may need someone else to help if needed for neck or back issues just because they are hard to reach areas. I use my product for lower back issues and to relieve tight tense muscles on the upper back and around the shoulder blades. I've only charged the product once so far and it's still going. I also have issues with pain from other health issues and I can't use pain medications so this product really helps control my pain level if I put it on massage. I highly recommend this product. Comes in a personal carry bag easy to take with you.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Spickerman

customer_reviews.title: Good tens unit for price
customer_reviews.text: Decent unit, works well thus far, helps daughter with tension in neck and shoulder, love that charges fast! Needs more pads though...
customer_reviews.author: MiMi

customer_reviews.title: Product stopped working after a few months
customer_reviews.text: At first this product worked great. I used it only a few times a week if that but after a few months it no longer worked. I would have loved it to last a little while longer
customer_reviews.author: alli mangrum

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This unit works better and is much stronger than the one I got from the doctors office
customer_reviews.author: douglas owens

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I've been gong to physical therapy for ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I've been gong to physical therapy for four months for back pain. In between sessions I was still suffering. This product has helped me tremulously. Very happy. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: MMC

customer_reviews.title: Great product, easy to use and powerful.
customer_reviews.text: Used this product twice and I was impressed with the ease of use and the intensity. I was concerned I wouldn’t find one as good as the one at the chiropractor. I couldn’t go much over 50% intensity. It is definitely strong enough and after just two 20m sessions, battery still showed as full.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Thomas

customer_reviews.title: that it works
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it, she has a degenerating cartilage issue and between physical therapy and the tens unit she is doing better, we are very satisfied that we spent a little more money and are glad we did, Thank you
customer_reviews.author: David C Stanford Sr

customer_reviews.title: Defective product
customer_reviews.text: 1sr one broke in less then 30 days. Replacement also broke in less than 30 days
customer_reviews.author: sue poponick

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Easy to maneuver and use
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Easy to maneuver and use. Instructions we easy to follow. Gives the right amount of muscle stimulation where it hurts. I have been using it on neck/shoulder pain lately. The TENS unit has given me a lot of relief with its variable speeds and pre-programmed stim for specific areas. What a great feature!
customer_reviews.author: Cristina G. Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great power, also like the time limit control. This is second one I bought
customer_reviews.author: John Yost

customer_reviews.title: Tens unit for pain
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best home use pain relief unit. It has 3 types of relief. You can control the intensity level and it definitely has more than you could use. One thing I didn't know is it has a gel to go with, which I'm going to order now.
customer_reviews.author: Donnasagearch

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Straight out of the box, I like it. I hooked it up and for the last several hours I have been massaging my back. Ahhhhhhh I feel so pampered!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron  Yarbrough

customer_reviews.title: It really works
customer_reviews.text: Very happy w/ my tens unit it worked so well I ended up buying a second one for a friend
customer_reviews.author: David Page

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer!
customer_reviews.text: This unit finally gave me some much needed relief for my sciatica problems. I bought it in March 2019 and the A side stopped working in November. I called the customer service department and they mailed me out a new one that day. They do stick by their 1 year warranty. I did use it daily esp in the evening to give me relief and was very happy with it and their customer service department
customer_reviews.author: Ken L.

customer_reviews.title: Quality device, works as intended.
customer_reviews.text: Quality device. Cords are annoying, dangling (wireless would be much more convenient!) Otherwise, works well as intended. My issue is sciatic nerve pain left back, and degenerative left hip pain.
customer_reviews.author: O'Irish

customer_reviews.title: Tens unit
customer_reviews.text: I love it!! It does the job. I have just finished physical therapy for my shoulder Nd on the days I didnt go for therapy I used it. My therapist chose this one for me and I am so glad I made the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Bought August 9 now not functional October 19. Towards ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought August 9 now not functional October 19. Towards the end of its life 3 or 4 of the massage function from one another. Difficult to decern a difference. Hope I can still return it.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Small and Powerful unit!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent TENS unit! I had one given to me by my doctor, who of course, billed the insurance company, but it is NO WHERE near the quality of this unit! This unit is small, compact, and provides a great amount of electrical stimulation and modes, for its price. I highly recommend it for anyone, looking to purchase a portable and powerful unit, for its price. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: RZ

customer_reviews.title: Great TENS Unit!
customer_reviews.text: This TENS unit is easy to use and helpful for pain!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT
customer_reviews.text: This product is excellent on all fronts! Great value, great product, easy to use, and definitely works to relax tired/achy/sore/spasm muscles! HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: Kandy M. Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Battery Cover Is Impossible To Remove
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely frustrated with this product in that it is impossible to remove the battery cover without breaking it! I still haven't managed to remove it. Poor design!!!!! I did charge it, however, but when I placed the pads on my feet for the first time and made certain that everything was hooked up correctly, I felt almost nothing at even the highest setting. I am not impressed with this product at all!!
customer_reviews.author: Todd Bennion

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, Broke after a month
customer_reviews.text: Cheap quality and broke after one month. Do NOT recommend. Feels cheap, quality is awful. Purchased this thinking because of the price it would be better. This is NOT the case. Have since purchased a unit for $25 and it is just as good if not better than this $95 unit. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 3 bulging disks in my neck/back
customer_reviews.text: I have severe pain in my neck and back because of 3 bulging disks. This device will loosen the muscles that cramp up around the injury and is very comfortable and easy to use. I look forward to using this every day for about 20-30 minutes with no side affects. Feels great!
customer_reviews.author: Troy and Kim

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this TENS system when my chiropractor recommended a home system to alleviate some of my lower back pain. I love it! It’s small, but packs a punch!
customer_reviews.author: K. Clyde

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE it!!! Easy to use and provides almost instant relief my my back pain and my husbands post-surgical knee pain! I highly recommend this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: joanfedwards

customer_reviews.title: Great Unit. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: This unit works very well. I like that there is two channels so I can use four pads, two on either side of my spine. Best investment I've made for recovery from a lumbar injury and fusion. I definitely recommend this over the much cheaper units found on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is save to use and easy to understand the operation
customer_reviews.text: It works great I have been feeling better after 3 weeks Used every day, for 20mnt, the only comments we should get 8 patches and not 4 LOL
customer_reviews.author: Juan c Almendarez

customer_reviews.title: professional product!
customer_reviews.text: it works, and very strong!, i have pain in my elbow, back etc and now i feel much better!
customer_reviews.author: william allan

customer_reviews.title: Nice little tens unit. Works well!
customer_reviews.text: I get about four uses on one battery charge. My physical therapist help me pick this machine out. I am happy with it. I recommend you purchase extra pads.
customer_reviews.author: Marc A

customer_reviews.title: great device
customer_reviews.text: Due to Covid-19 around, I have not been able to get my massage. This device helped my stiff neck muscles tremendously.
customer_reviews.author: sho

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Helped with chronic back pain on the first day of using it.
customer_reviews.author: Eastern shore shopper

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little thing!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been experiencing right shoulder pain for a couple months now...this little machine has been amazing...I usually do 2 consecutive sessions every other day and pain is controlled considerably.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working a little over 60 days from date of purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the unit on July 2nd 2020 and as of today September 20th 2020, the unit no longer works. The B side of the unit fails to send any current no matter what lead is placed in that position. It’s outside of the 30 day window for a return. This unit replaced another unit I had for over 10 years. Unfortunately that company is no longer in business or I would have went in that direction. I’m very dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: GM

customer_reviews.title: It looks nice
customer_reviews.text: I don't like that there's no belt clip. I've dropped it several times. Who wants to carry a device in your hand all the time.
customer_reviews.author: DeeDee

customer_reviews.title: Huge waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Item does not work. I followed all instructions and have tried using it several times. It will not turn on. I can’t believe I wasted that much money.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Martin

customer_reviews.title: Sore muscle relief
customer_reviews.text: Using this device has provided temporary relief for sore muscles due to overuse and exercise.
customer_reviews.author: Ida Pucino

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, very very powerful and the battery lasts forever. After four 30 min sessions the battery had only dropped one bar. And it recharges very quickly. This unit works as well as the the professional unit at my physical therapy provider. It's more expensive than most of the others sold here, but worth every penny. I have absolutely no regrets about this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: -Rick-

customer_reviews.title: Great pain relief!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic product. My husband uses it almost every night and swears by it. Buying more adhesive pads are easy and cheap too! The battery lasts several uses and it's really easy to use. I have recommended it to several friends and family members.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia C

customer_reviews.title: Not my cup of tea.
customer_reviews.text: A bit too complicated and hard to raise the power on.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Ingram

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and works great. Surprisingly strong for its size. Compact and portable. A great investment!
customer_reviews.author: Rey D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: An excellent unit. Easy to use and effective for knee rehab. And also FSA reimburseable!
customer_reviews.author: SherriRN

customer_reviews.title: Glad I Bought this Unit
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, great unit for muscle pain and knots on your shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: Suki

customer_reviews.title: Disposable?
customer_reviews.text: Worked great until it didn’t. One line stopped working after a few months. Both are now done after 6 months. Tried replacement lines but it’s the unit. I expected more from a “pro” piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incredible battery life
customer_reviews.text: Product works great, and the battery life exceeded my expectations. It can run for hours on a charge. Definitely glad I made the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Don W.

customer_reviews.title: I have OProblem with this Produck
customer_reviews.text: I have Problem with this Produck I buy 2, last year and this Year, befor One year already Broken...I want to get the new One, because still Granted one year
customer_reviews.author: ingrid fournier

customer_reviews.title: Great product.. buy the gel and extra pads
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy this product, very easy and enjoyable. Helped with knee pain tremendously
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Would
customer_reviews.text: Recommend this product as it has more options for intensity and pain control. It is working after a few days as described.
customer_reviews.author: Frank goldberg

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Helped with my constant nerve pain on my side/back from shingles

customer_reviews.title: Tens unit
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Easy set up. Did help with pain relief.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good gift for loved ones with pain.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my boyfriend who has back pain, he uses it frequently and says it helps massage muscles when hurting.
customer_reviews.author: jordan

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: perchase 3 times as gift after noticing it remove my shoulder pain lower back pain ankle sleeping on a $8000 mattress and was still waking up with pain purchase this with my h.s.a. apply it twice no back pain wish I could return my $8000 mattress love the product gotten for my mother
customer_reviews.author: mike trinidad

customer_reviews.title: Relief is temporary but it is well worth the investment.
customer_reviews.text: The TENS unit was easy to use and it quickly provided temporary relief to muscle and joints.
customer_reviews.author: Mark L. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Tension
customer_reviews.text: Used only daily for one week. It has helped relaxing the tension in my neck. Very pleased with product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Help with my arthritis pain!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and the use of unit has eased my arthritis pain considerably! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Schilz

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 2 months
customer_reviews.text: This unit no longer holds a charge after charging all night. So it no longer works. Only after two months. Cannot find a way to return it or have it repaired.
customer_reviews.author: D Long

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We like it so much we bought a 2nd unit
customer_reviews.author: Chef Ronda

customer_reviews.title: What a relief!!
customer_reviews.text: While it’s difficult to apply pads yourself if you plan ahead you can easily. The results are phenomenal!! Just as effective as at the Ones professionals charge big dollars fir
customer_reviews.author: Jim3497

customer_reviews.title: quality product, well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research on evaluating various TENS units before settling on the unit and am definitely pleased with the purchase. Unit is very easy to operate and has a long battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Compact and Functional!
customer_reviews.text: Great powerful unit for the compact size. Has all the functions needed for pain relief. I feel so much better after using this unit after two uses. I’m very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Farhad

customer_reviews.title: Works like it says
customer_reviews.text: Works like it says. Buttons should be recessed for travel so it doesn’t turn on accidently and kill battery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is one powerful little device and packs a nice punch. At 14 bars on some settings it's ...
customer_reviews.text: I buy a lot of stuff on Amazon, but rarely leave reviews. The Easy-Home TENS Unit, however, is worthy of my time! The reviews thus far are spot-on. This is one powerful little device and packs a nice punch. At 14 bars on some settings it's just one tick away from full electrocution -- and I love it! Thanks to the team that brought this to market. Only had it one day so I can't comment on durability -- but it feels solid and the quality is evident right down to the packaging. I sure am hoping this lasts a good long time!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Moyle

customer_reviews.title: Cannot beat the cost/performance ratio.
customer_reviews.text: We love this deep penetrating zap to the affected area we Love the product so much recommend to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lee Walker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I have 5 spinal disorders that cause terrible pain for me. I would never have believed that I could have a unit of this quality in a portable unit. If you are tired of being in pain and want something that truly gives relief, get this TENS unit.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Easy
customer_reviews.text: I love this massager. It is easy to use, and has several settings depending on the mode or strength that you want/need. I use it mostly on my back, and after the 20 minute session my muscles feel so much more relaxed.
customer_reviews.author: John Hanley

customer_reviews.title: easy to operate
customer_reviews.text: Husband's birthday gift . Loves it !! Relieves tension , easy to operate , ability to set intensity.
customer_reviews.author: Chhristine Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Good relief
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband”s bad back and he says it provides much relief . He can apply himself
customer_reviews.author: CountryGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great for nerve and muscle pain
customer_reviews.text: I have tennis elbow / ulnar neuropathy and carpal tunnel and this TENS unit is the only thing that helps relieve the pain on really bad days. I also use it for neck and shoulder pain as well. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my mother, kind of hard for her to understand but other then that product works well.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal G

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product but the pads are small.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Colwell

product_meta.title: Easy@Home Professional Grade Rechargeable TENS Unit Electronic Pulse Massager,Backlit LCD Display, Professional Grade Powerful Pulse Intensity, 510K Cleared, FSA Eligible OTC Home Use, EHE012PRO
feature_bullets: ✔ Are you looking for a professional grade premium pain relief and muscle recovery TENS Unit? Here is Easy@Home EHE012PRO, the professional natural and highly effective pain relief device with muscle stimulation effect. The premium design with professional grade powerful pulse intensity makes it suitable not only for pain relief and muscle relaxation but also for muscle recovery and pain management for amateur and professional athletes or regular exercisers.

✔ PROFESSIONAL GRADE: 20 Power Levels for Intensity from very mild to extremely powerful, 5 Automated Massage Program Options and 3 Traditional Massage Modes. Approved for OTC home use effective pain relief therapy device.
✔ RECHARGEABLE BATTERY: Rechargeable lithium-ion battery through USB or DC. Up to 120 minutes per session multiple times a day. 4 electrode pads and elegant leather storage bag included.

✔ USER FRIENDLY: User friendly, portable and compact design with a large backlit LCD screen with fully automated intuitive massage programs and adjustable Intensity. Digital controls for left and right channels independently to have different intensity and mode.

✔ SAFETY AND WARRANTY: **We are so confident that you will love this product that we offer a 1 Year PRODUCT Quality Guarantee.*. ( *** DO NOT use the product if you have a cardiac pacemaker or an existing cardiac condition, implanted metal devices/screws areas of the body or suffer from epilepsy. Please read the complete safety warnings before purchase. ***)
